explains: adj. 紊乱的；纠缠的；缠结的；复杂的
wordGroup: tangle with 与…吵架，争吵；与…争论；与…有纠葛

sentences.en: Animals get tangled in fishing nets and drown.
sentences.cn: 动物被缠在渔网里淹死了。

sentences.en: We were caught in a tangled web of relationships.
sentences.cn: 我们陷入了错综复杂的人际关系网络。

sentences.en: He described it as an extraordinarily tangled and complicated tale.
sentences.cn: 他把它讲成了一个格外错综复杂的故事。
